nodes.text: Ogemites were a sentient species in the galaxy. During the High Republic Era, several Ogemites were passengers aboard the starship Journeyman when it was crippled by an impact with hyperspace debris sometime after the Great Hyperspace Disaster. Jedi Master Cohmac Vitus, who boarded the Journeyman to assist with saving its passengers, saw some of the Ogemites while heading to clear a blockage preventing access to the escape pods.
